title: Document Box (Ry√¥shibako) with Auspicious Landscape Design
dimensions: overall, closed: H. 22.9 x W. 32.8 x D. 28.5 cm (9 x 12 15/16 x 11 1/4 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, The Elaine Ehrenkranz Collection of Japanese Lacquer Boxes; Gift of Elaine Ehrenkranz
medium: Lacquer on wood with decoration in gold and seisei urushi (cooked lacquer) utilizing the hiramaki-e (low-relief sprinkled design), takamaki-e (high-relief sprinkled design), and nashiji ("pear-skinned" ground) techniques; gold and shakudo (copper-gold alloy) fittings
